name: Season Match 3 - Curse of the Witch Crow
description: Enter a magical fairy-tale world and overcome the evil Crow Witch! After the Crow Witch captures the Months, the world may never see a New Year again!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun matching game with different special abilities as you progress through the game. There are lots of hidden object games in this one and I felt like the game took much longer than it needed to last. It overstayed its fun time. Other than that it was a good game, well made, and definitely entertaining. Easy achievements for those who enjoy chasing those.

If you have a 4:3 monitor, the sides of the screen are cut off, making some levels unplayable because items you need to click on are somewhere offscreen. There's no way to change the resolution or switch to widescreen mode in the game options; you have to actually change your monitor resolution. I didn't feel like bothering with that, so I got a refund.
